product.product_title: Feethit Womens Slip On Running Shoes Non Slip Walking Shoes Lightweight Gym Workout Shoes Breathable Fashion Sneakers
product.cushioning: Plush memory foam insole molds to the foot for personalized cushioning and all-day support.
product.breathability: Highly breathable, stretchable mesh upper promotes maximum airflow for a cool, dry feel.
product.short_description: Discover the ultimate in convenient, all-day comfort with the Feethit Womens Slip On Running Shoes. Designed for the active woman who values both performance and ease, these lightweight sneakers are perfect for walking, gym workouts, running errands, and everything in between. The standout feature is the innovative slip-on design, featuring a stretchable, breathable mesh upper that conforms to your foot for a snug, sock-like fit without the hassle of laces. This ensures easy on-and-off access while providing a secure, comfortable feel. The upper's breathable construction promotes maximum airflow, keeping your feet cool and dry even during intense activities. Inside, a plush memory foam insole molds to the unique contours of your foot, delivering personalized cushioning and support for all-day wear. The lightweight EVA outsole provides flexible, non-slip traction. For a shoe that combines slip-on convenience, breathable comfort, and athletic performance, the Feethit sneakers are the perfect choice for your active lifestyle.
product.about_this_item: Lightweight and breathable upper, comfy liner, slip-resistant outsole, fashionable, suitable for multiple occasions
